summary.span: 表示一个可以存储多个数据对象的容器。

span.span: Represents a container that can store multiple data objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个抽象类，可用于将对象组织成定义的物理格式的单个实体，以实现可移植性和高效访问。 is an abstract class that can be used to organize objects into a single entity of a defined physical format for portability and efficient access. ZIP 文件是的主要物理格式 。A ZIP file is the primary physical format for the . 其他 实现可能使用其他物理格式，如 XML 文档、数据库或 Web 服务。Other implementations might use other physical formats such as an XML document, a database, or Web service. 与文件系统类似，中包含的项 将在文件夹和文件的层次结构中引用。Like a file system, items contained in a are referenced in a hierarchical organization of folders and files. 尽管 本身是抽象类，但 方法使用派生类作为默认值 。Although itself is an abstract class, the derived class is used as default by the method. ( "part" ) 是表示存储在中的对象的抽象类 。A ("part") is the abstract class that represents an object that is stored in a . ( "relationship" ) 定义源 对象或目标对象之间的关联 。A ("relationship") defines an association between a source or and a target object. 可以是以下两种类型之一，其中每种类型可以为以下两种形式之一：A can be one of two types, each of which can be one of two forms: - 由方法创建的包级别关系 () 将与 相关联 ：A package-level relationship (created by the method) relates a to either: - 包中的目标部分。A target part in the package. - 包外部的目标资源。A target resource outside the package. - 由方法创建的部分级关系 () 将源关联 到以下项之一：A part-level relationship (created by the method) relates a source to either: - 包中的另一个目标部件。Another target part in the package. - 包外部的目标资源。A target resource outside the package. 关系的源 或源 被视为关系的 "所有者"。The relationship's source or source is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 删除源对象时，还将删除源对象所拥有的所有关系。When the source object is deleted, all the relationships owned by the source object are also deleted. 创建或删除关系的过程不会以任何方式以物理方式更改源对象或目标对象。The process of creating or deleting a relationship does not physically change either the source or target objects in any way. ( "数字签名" ) 是部件和关系的组合，表示包含的数字签名 。A ("digital signature") is a composition of parts and relationships representing a digital signature included with a . 数字签名标识发信方，并验证中包含的签名部分和关系 是否未被修改。The digital signature identifies the originator and validates that the signed parts and relationships contained in the have not been modified. 包还支持 (DRM) 的数字 Rights Management，这允许使用向 授权用户授予的特定访问权限对中的内容元素进行加密。Packages also support Digital Rights Management (DRM) which allows content elements in a to be encrypted with specific access rights granted to authorized users. 基于 体系结构， 是一种包类型，用于根据打开的 [XML 纸张规格 (XPS) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)来存储文档。Based on the architecture, an is a package type designed for storing documents based on the open [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). 默认情况下，.NET Framework 使用包来存储页面和文档的内容、资源和关系。The .NET Framework uses packages to store content, resources, and relationships for pages and documents using a standard ZIP file by default. 与任何 ZIP 文件一样，应用程序可以使用 类来存储和选择在单个有效访问权限容器中保护任何类型或数量的数据文件。As with any ZIP file, your application can use the classes to store and optionally protect any type or number of data files in a single efficient-to-access container. 有关详细信息，请参阅开放打包约定 (OPC) 规范可供下载 。For more information, see the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了创建的基本步骤 。The following example shows the basic steps for creating a . 在此示例中，创建了一个包，其中包含一个作为文档一部分显示的图形图像。In this example, a package is created to contain a document together with a graphic image that is displayed as part of the document. (这类似于 HTML 文件具有 \ 引用外部映像文件的标记的情况。 ) 两个 元素也包含在包中。(This is similar to the case in which an HTML file has an \ tag that references an external image file.) Two elements are also included in the package. 第一种是 "包级别" 关系，它将文档部件定义为包的根元素。The first, a "package-level" relationship, defines the document part as the package's root element. 第二个 "part level" 关系定义文档部件 (部件级关系) 的 "源" 之间的关联，并在部件级别关系) ("目标" 图像部分。A second, "part-level" relationship defines the association between the document part (the "source" of the part-level relationship) and its use of the image part (the "target" of the part-level relationship). 有关完整示例，请参阅 [编写包示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055)。For the complete sample, see [Writing a Package Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055). remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生 方法由 方法调用，以基于派生类中实现的物理格式创建部件。The derived method is called by the method to create a part based on the physical format implemented in the derived class. 默认情况下， 提供并使用抽象类的派生类实现 。By default, a derived class implementation of the abstract class is provided and used. 在默认操作中，在 内部调用 类以在 ZIP 文件中创建新部件。In the default operation, internally calls of the class to create a new part in a ZIP file. 对于默认的 派生类，该 方法仅支持两个 `compressionOption` 值 或 压缩。For the default derived class, the method only supports two `compressionOption` values, or compression. 、 或 使用压缩的其他值 。Other values of , , or use compression. 有关包模型和包部分的详细信息，请参阅 (OPC 的开放打包约定的第1章) 可从下载 。For more information about the package model and package parts, see Chapter 1 of the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at .

para.span: 派生 实现不应对调用它的方法所执行的顺序或操作进行任何假设 。

span.span: The derived implementation should make no assumptions about the order or operations performed by the method that calls it.

summary.span: 创建与给定的部件的包级别关系。

span.span: Creates a package-level relationship to a given part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包级别关系定义包和关联的目标部分或资源之间的关联。A package-level relationship defines an association between the package and an associated target part or resource. 包级别关系可以是以下两种形式之一。A package-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 在 到包内的目标之间 。Between a to a target inside the package. - 与包外部的目标资源之间的。Between a to a target resource outside the package. 在包关系中，包被视为关系的 "所有者"。In a package-relationship the package is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 删除包时，还将删除该包拥有的所有关系。When the package is deleted, all the relationships owned by the package are also deleted. 创建或删除关系的过程不会以任何方式在物理上改变目标部分或资源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 有关其他信息，请参阅开放打包约定 (OPC) 规范可供下载 。For additional information, see the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at . ## Examples 下面的示例说明如何在 和根文档部分之间创建。The following example illustrates creating a between a and a root document part. 有关完整示例，请参阅 [编写包示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055)。For the complete sample, see [Writing a Package Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160055). summary.span: 返回所有包级别关系的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of all the package-level relationships.

returns.span: 包中包含的所有包级别关系的集合。

span.span: A collection of all the package-level relationships that are contained in the package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永远不会返回 `null` ; 但是，如果包不包含包级别关系，则返回的集合可能包含零个元素。 will never return `null`; however the returned collection may contain zero elements if the package contains no package-level relationships. 包级别关系定义包和关联的目标部分或资源之间的关联。A package-level relationship defines an association between the package and an associated target part or resource. 包级别关系可以是以下两种形式之一。A package-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 在 到包中的目标部分之间。Between a to a target part in the package. - 与包外部的目标资源之间的。Between a to a target resource outside the package. 在包关系中，包被视为关系的 "所有者"。In a package-relationship the package is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 删除包时，还将删除该包拥有的所有关系。When the package is deleted, all the relationships owned by the package are also deleted. 创建或删除关系的过程不会以任何方式在物理上改变目标部分或资源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 有关打包和包关系的其他信息，请参阅 (OPC) 规范的开放打包约定第1.3 节，可在下载 。For additional information about packaging and package relationships, see section 1.3 of the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification available for download at .
